## Type of Change
<!-- Check all that apply -->
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change fixing an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change adding functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that breaks existing functionality)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code quality improvement

## Testing
<!-- Describe the testing you performed -->
- [ ] All tests pass locally (`npm run validate`)
- [ ] Added/updated unit tests for changes
- [ ] Manually tested in browser
- [ ] Tested on multiple Node.js versions (18.x, 20.x)
- [ ] Verified no console errors or warnings

## Code Quality Checklist
- [ ] Code follows the style guidelines in [CLAUDE.md](../CLAUDE.md)
- [ ] Self-reviewed the code changes
- [ ] Commented complex or non-obvious code
- [ ] Updated documentation (README, CLAUDE.md, CHANGELOG.md, etc.)
- [ ] No new TypeScript errors or warnings
- [ ] Followed existing module organization patterns
- [ ] Reused existing utilities instead of creating duplicates

## Architecture Alignment
<!-- Check if you followed the codebase architecture -->
- [ ] Checked for existing utilities before creating new ones
- [ ] Used constants from `constants.ts` instead of magic numbers
- [ ] Added new types to `types/index.ts` if needed
- [ ] Followed import patterns from barrel exports
- [ ] Used appropriate error classes from `errors.ts`
